bug.short_desc: 4.9.5-200.fc25.aarch64 fails to boot at all on Mustang A3 hardware
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
EFI stub: Booting Linux Kernel... EFI stub: Using DTB from configuration table EFI stub: Exiting boot services and installing virtual address map... L3c Cache: 8MB
Synchronous Exception at 0x00000043F9B71720 0: FP 0x00000043FFA78710 SP 0x00000043FFA78710 PC 0x00000043FA38171C 1: FP 0x00000043FFA78760 SP 0x00000043FFA78720 PC 0x00000043FA381894 2: FP 0x00000043FFA78790 SP 0x00000043FFA78770 PC 0x00000043FA383780 3: FP 0x00000043FFA787C0 SP 0x00000043FFA787A0 PC 0x00000043FA3805B0 4: FP 0x00000043FFA78910 SP 0x00000043FFA787D0 PC 0x00000043FA37ED38 5: FP 0x00000043FFA789E0 SP 0x00000043FFA78920 PC 0x00000043FA37AE08 6: FP 0x00000043FFA78A00 SP 0x00000043FFA789F0 PC 0x00000043F7FA7D14 7: FP 0x00000043FFA78A10 SP 0x00000043FFA78A10 PC 0x00000043F7FA79F8 8: FP 0x00000043FFA78A60 SP 0x00000043FFA78A20 PC 0x00000043F7FEC1D4 9: FP 0x00000043FFA78A90 SP 0x00000043FFA78A70 PC 0x00000043F7F6E194 10: FP 0x00000043FFA78B00 SP 0x00000043FFA78AA0 PC 0x00000043F7F6DD68 11: FP 0x00000043FFA78B80 SP 0x00000043FFA78B10 PC 0x00000043F7F69CF4 12: FP 0x00000043FFA78BF0 SP 0x00000043FFA78B90 PC 0x00000043F7F6A0F0 13: FP 0x00000043FFA78C10 SP 0x00000043FFA78C00 PC 0x00000043F7F6A1EC 14: FP 0x00000043FFA78C40 SP 0x00000043FFA78C20 PC 0x00000043F7F6A248 15: FP 0x00000043FFA78C50 SP 0x00000043FFA78C50 PC 0x00000043FA654B68 16: FP 0x00000043FFA78CA0 SP 0x00000043FFA78C60 PC 0x00000043FFA7BBD0 17: FP 0x00000043FFA78CF0 SP 0x00000043FFA78CB0 PC 0x00000043FF9942DC 18: FP 0x00000043FFA78D50 SP 0x00000043FFA78D00 PC 0x00000043FF98DD18 19: FP 0x00000043FFA78DA0 SP 0x00000043FFA78D60 PC 0x00000043FF98C474 20: FP 0x00000043FFA78DD0 SP 0x00000043FFA78DB0 PC 0x00000043FF98BB40 21: FP 0x00000043FFA78E80 SP 0x00000043FFA78DE0 PC 0x00000043FF98BD48 22: FP 0x00000043FFA78EF0 SP 0x00000043FFA78E90 PC 0x00000043FFA797F4 23: FP 0x00000043FFA78FE0 SP 0x00000043FFA78F00 PC 0x00000043FFA79270
and it just hangs there.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
kernel 4.9.5-200.fc25.aarch64
How reproducible:
At least once.
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Install kernel and reboot.

Hardware:
X-Gene Mustang Board Boot firmware (version 1.15.23 built at 13:21:52 on Nov 24 2015) TianoCore 1.1.0 UEFI 2.4.0 Nov 24 2015 13:21:07 CPU: APM ARM 64-bit Potenza Rev A3 2400MHz PCP 2400MHz 32 KB ICACHE, 32 KB DCACHE SOC 2000MHz IOBAXI 400MHz AXI 250MHz AHB 200MHz GFC 125MHz Board: X-Gene Mustang Board Slimpro FW: Ver: 2.4 (build 01.15.23.00 2015/11/24) PMD: 950 mV SOC: 950 mV
Last working kernel is 4.8.12-300.fc25.aarch64
Fixed by https://patches.linaro.org/patch/93022/ according to hrw.
The patch is included in 4.9.9 that should fix the regression
Looks like this is now fixed with kernel-4.9.9-200.fc25.aarch64
